metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10163 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
Memory leak in the vrend_renderer_context_create_internal function in vrend_decode.c in virglrenderer before 0.6.0 allows local guest OS users to cause a denial of service (host memory consumption) by repeatedly creating a decode context.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10163` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvirglrenderer0 - 0.6.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: virglrenderer package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.6.0-1').
